Articles.Content:
I Looked Up ODIN From CoD: Ghosts In KSP For Quite A While And Then I Saw OBP 1, It Was Pretty Bare Bones So I Used The Missile System That I Got from OBP 1 And Some Pictures Of ODIN To Make ODIN

Download A Stock ODIN Satellite Here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ydbk6u1n2p03b17/ODIN%20Satellite%20%28Stock%29.craft?dl=0

A Image Of A Stock ODIN In The VAB

A Modded ODIN In Orbit 

 

Download A Modded ODIN Here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/sfnpzjusnmdaxcy/ODIN%20Moded.zip?dl=0

Anyways, Odin is based off the real life concept of Kinetic bombardment, which was studied by the USAF as Project Thor. Just type in project Thor or "Rods from the gods" anywhere to find information about it. I think Scott Manley made a few videos based on it awhile ago.
This Is Not A Freaking Mod!! The Only Mod Required To Run The Modded ODIN Is B9! Ok
Oh And By The Way ,I Couldn't Get The Pics To Work

Moved to Spacecraft Exchange. 

Also, some posts have been removed. Guys, rather than confront the OP with remarks in the thread, please just hit the report button and let us moderators know when something needs to be moved.

I am not sure if dropbox images will work that way, usually we upload to imgur.com and then get the direct link for an image and then use the 'Insert other media' button in the bottom of the edit box.
